Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Lid
Description: Lid with circular knob in the middle. Paste of a reddish colour. The exterior suface shows a painted decoration consisting of concentric circles in black, framed by two thin bands with painting in a light colour. Between these, black strokes in zigzag, framing triangles.
